main.name: Bob4External Affairs (Bob 🥇)
main.description: Thank you for showing faith in me by nominating me for AMSUN External Affairs Representative. Now, we have the one task remaining of casting our votes 👏👏.
main.bio: My name is Bob, finalist medical student 👨‍⚕️, mentor, leader, ambassador of one of the global tech giants, a research assistant, just to mention a few. I'm optimistic  that, through utilizing some of the untapped connections and partnerships, we can better AMSUN. 🌍

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your the strategic plan

plan.strategy: A Plan to Uplift all Medics
plan.description: 1. Subsidized training for BLS and ATLS (for all) 🩺
plan.description2: 2. Expand connection with corporate partners to fund AMSUN activities ✔️
plan.description3: 3. Widen Opportunities For Clinical and Non-clinical Electives, Research programs, Health Technology, and Entrepreneurships Locally and Globally 🌍
plan.description4: 4. Expand and link with Microsoft and Samsung, with whom I have been enganging with for 2 years now. This will foster mentorship on Health Innovation 👨🏽‍💻

work.title: For the Formative Years
work.description: - Upscaling of Mentorship program and strengthen review sessions. 🫂

work.title: For Junior Clinical Years
work.description: - Promote Availability of USMLE, PLAB, and AMC Materials. 📚

work.title: For the Seniors
work.description: - Facilitate Return of Student-Based Grand Rounds and Mentorship 🧑‍🏫
work.description2: - Widen Opportunities For Clinical and Non-clinical Electives, Research programs, Health Technology, and Entrepreneurships Locally and Globally 👨🏽‍💻.

work.title: For the Finalists
work.description: - Network with the Alumni, KMPDU, and KMA for Mentorship on Academics, Finance, Entrepreneurship, and Leadership 💉
